con:part.con:content: <wsdl:definitions name="GisServerInterface" targetNamespace="urn:GisServerInterface" xmlns:soapenc="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:typens="urn:GisServerInterface" xmlns="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/"> <wsdl:types> <xsd:schema targetNamespace="urn:GisServerInterface"> <xsd:complexType name="getLayer_pointStruct"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="lat" type="xsd:float"/> <xsd:element name="lon" type="xsd:float"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="getLayer_retStruct"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="retCode" type="xsd:int"/> <xsd:element name="retMsg" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="retLayer" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="retLayerPrior" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="retSignal" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="retSector" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="retLayerFlag" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="retLayerMessage" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="retLayerInfo" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema> </wsdl:types> <wsdl:message name="getLayer_prm"> <wsdl:part name="getLayer_prmIn" type="typens:getLayer_pointStruct"/> <wsdl:part name="getLayer_AppIdIn" type="xsd:int"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="getLayer_ret"> <wsdl:part name="getLayer_retOut" type="typens:getLayer_retStruct"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:portType name="GisServerPortType"> <wsdl:operation name="getLayer"> <documentation>getLayer: Legge le informazioni del layer Input: getLayer_prmIn.lat = latidutine del punto (WGS84) getLayer_prmIn.lon = longitudine del punto (WGS84) getLayer_AppIdIn = idenfificativo applicazione Output: getLayer_retOut.retCode = codice di ritorno, 0=OK, !=errore getLayer_retOut.retMsg = messaggio di ritorno "OK" !="OK" descrizione errore getLayer_retOut.retLayer = idenfiticativi layer separati da ; (es: "WI;WO;LO;WF") getLayer_retOut.retLayerPrior = priorita' assolura layer separati da ; (es: "1;2;4;3") getLayer_retOut.retSignal = livello segnale layer separati da ; (es: "-70;-81;-81;NA") getLayer_retOut.retSector = elenco settore separati da ; (es: "RM0001W;RM0001W;RM0002L;NA") getLayer_retOut.retLayerFlag = abilitazione settori separati da ; (es: "E;D;E;E") getLayer_retOut.retLayerMessage = messaggio informativo da visualizzare getLayer_retOut.retLayerInfo = struttura informativa XML codificata in ENC64</documentation> <wsdl:input message="typens:getLayer_prm"/> <wsdl:output message="typens:getLayer_ret"/> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType> <wsdl:binding name="GisServerBinding" type="typens:GisServerPortType"> <soap:binding transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http" style="rpc"/> <wsdl:operation name="getLayer"> <soap:operation soapAction="urn:getLayer" style="rpc"/> <wsdl:input> <soap:body use="encoded" namespace="urn:GisServerInterface" encodingStyle="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:body use="encoded" namespace="urn:GisServerInterface" encodingStyle="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:binding> <wsdl:service name="gisServerService"> <wsdl:port name="GisServerPort" binding="typens:GisServerBinding"> <soap:address location="http://172.20.0.17/gisServer/gisserver.php"/> </wsdl:port> </wsdl:service> </wsdl:definitions>

con:response.name: Response 1
con:response.con:responseContent:
0 OK LTEID;LTEOD;WMXID;WMXOD 10;20;30;40 18;18;-70;-70 BA0019W_2;BA0019W_2;BA0022W_3;BA0022W_3 E;D;E;E Complimenti!

L’indirizzo $$ è raggiunto dal servizio Linkem. Potrai navigare fino a 20 Mega senza linea fissa e senza limiti. Acquistare Linkem è semplice e veloce: avrai solo bisogno del tuo codice fiscale e della tua carta d’identità.

]]> PGluZm8+Q29wZXJ0dXJhIE9LPC9pbmZvPg==

con:response.name: Response-ko
con:response.con:responseContent: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:urn="urn:GisServerInterface"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <urn:getLayerResponse soapenv:encodingStyle="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/"> <getLayer_retOut xsi:type="urn:getLayer_retStruct"> <retCode xsi:type="xsd:int">1</retCode> <retMsg xsi:type="xsd:string">Nessuna copertura di rete per l'indirizzo specificato</retMsg> <retLayer xsi:type="xsd:string"></retLayer> <retLayerPrior xsi:type="xsd:string"></retLayerPrior> <retSignal xsi:type="xsd:string"></retSignal> <retSector xsi:type="xsd:string"></retSector> <retLayerFlag xsi:type="xsd:string"></retLayerFlag> <retLayerMessage xsi:type="xsd:string">Nessuna copertura di rete per l'indirizzo specificato</retLayerMessage> <retLayerInfo xsi:type="xsd:string">test</retLayerInfo> </getLayer_retOut> </urn:getLayerResponse> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:response.name: Response ok 2
con:response.con:responseContent:
0 OK LTEOD;WMXID;LTEID;WMXOD 10;20;30;40 18;18;-70;-70 BA0019W_2;BA0019W_2;BA0022W_3;BA0022W_3 D;D;E;E Complimenti!

L’indirizzo $$ è raggiunto dal servizio Linkem. Potrai navigare fino a 20 Mega senza linea fissa e senza limiti. Acquistare Linkem è semplice e veloce: avrai solo bisogno del tuo codice fiscale e della tua carta d’identità.
